          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Sopron - Látkép</string>
            <string language="en-US">Sopron – View</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sopron? Ansicht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sopron ? Vue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sopron? Vista</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sopron? Vista</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Sopron; Όψη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Sopron? Visión</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Előtérben a Nagyboldogasszony (Bencés, illetve Kecske) templom és az evangélikus templom tornya, háttérben a hegyek</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Church of Our Lady (Goat church, Benedictine church) in the foreground and the tower of the evangelist church, mountains in the background</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">város</string>
            <string language="en-US">town</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">Sopron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">Kecske templom</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kirche unserer Dame (Ziegekirche, Benedictine
Kirche) im Vordergrund und des Aufsatzes der Evangelistkirche, Berge 
im Hintergrund</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'église de notre Madame (église de chèvre, 
église bénédictine) dans le premier plan et de la tour de l'église
d'évangéliste, montagnes dans le fond</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A igreja de nossa senhora (igreja da cabra, 
igreja benedictine) no primeiro plano e da torre da igreja do 
evangelist, montanhas no fundo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La chiesa della nostra signora (chiesa della 
capra, chiesa benedictine) nella priorità alta e della torretta della
chiesa del evangelist, montagne nei precedenti</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εκκλησία της κυρίας μας (εκκλησία αιγών, 
benedictine εκκλησία) στο πρώτο πλάνο και τον πύργο της 
evangelist εκκλησίας, βουνά στο υπόβαθρο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La iglesia de nuestra señora (iglesia de la 
cabra, iglesia benedictina) en el primero plano y de la torre de la 
iglesia del evangelista, montañas en el fondo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stadt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ville</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">città</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πόλη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ciudad</string>
          </keyword>
